name: DomainTools Hosting History
description: Retrieve historical IP address and hosting infrastructure data for a domain from DomainTools API. Track changes in domain hosting over time to identify infrastructure migrations, shared hosting relationships, and patterns for threat analysis

domain.description: The domain name to retrieve hosting history for (e.g., example.com)

domain_name.description: The domain name that was queried

ip_history.description: Chronological array of IP addresses where the domain has been hosted, showing infrastructure changes over time

post_ip.description: The IP address after the change (new IP address)

pre_ip.description: The IP address before the change (previous IP address, null for initial setup)

action.description: Action code: 'N' for New, 'C' for Change, 'D' for Delete

actiondate.description: Date when the IP address change occurred in YYYY-MM-DD format

registrar_history.description: Historical record of registrar changes for the domain

nameserver_history.description: Historical record of nameserver changes for the domain
